summary: this mod simply makes your quivers and back weapon to place on the  proper  position. (CBBE friendly version are now on!)
descriptionHtml:
hellooooo guys! long time no see 
I got a lot of messages that is asking about new dawn guard version.
sorry for did not reply 

I\'m being busy now because damn thesis. I need to graduate! YEAH!!!!
so unfortunately I don\'t have time for update big mods.

  I\'m sorry. will not have  dawnguard version.


but as I promises.(I feel like I promised this long long loooong ago, but I\'m gonna think this is not to late. ha...it\'s cool enough. :P  ) I made tutorial about how to edit skeleton file.
so you guys would can have awesome moders who are better than me or you can just fix your own skeleton. 

for this tutorial, you can download the source file that have name bone edit kit.
in side file, you can have every source that you need when you try to edit skeleton file.

for program it\'s called Nifscope and it\'s free software.

 you can down load it here

http://sourceforge.net/projects/niftools/files/nifskope/1.1.0/

tutorial is made with Korean but have English subtle, and it would be terrible, but don\'t balm me. it\'s not my fault , it\'s my ancestors\'.  they didn\'t invent English at the first time. LOL 
anyway I wish this will work out
 

by the way this source containing mesh that came from other mod
so I\'m gonna credit in here

winter is coming base mesh by by Nivea
cloaks of skyrim base mesh by by Noodles

[youtube]y3PD7ipf4q8[/youtube]
      




hey~ first I made this mod because of my other  mods

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6546]{Private Selective Quivers}[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7548]{Selective Quivers}[/url]



this mod simply fix a bug that vanilla\'s quivers place on the not right place
for the details
I fixed quivers angle not to  overlap with bows
I made quivers to place on the little more down position to look nicer
I fixed distance between quiver and characters , so no more floating arrows! LOL

added +no more dangling swords pack.(actually this mod didn\'t have any beast character version, so I added)
added Realistic Ragdolls and Force compatible version

1.1 updated!
added CBBE friendly version(I made this base one slim version, i will update normal one later. )
fixed the male\'s bow location because of ebony arrows
fixed back weapon location to fit with quivers location
(I try to make them not to looks weird when they are stand both )
(ps. I did it, but now I feel like this is pointless... who are going to equip 2H weapon and Quiver both;;? why?  any way, I\'m uploading this cos\' I spend 2 hours to find out right place LOL!)
I changed all back side weapon, so I just change mod name to \"Well Placed Weapons & Quivers\"




installing
Extract data folder to your Skyrim folder

-Compatibility-
it is ok to install with Closer Quivers, but this would makes quivers too close
not compatible with mod that is changing bone files.

added +no more dangling swords pack.(actually this mod didn\'t have any beast character version, so I added)
added Realistic Ragdolls and Force compatible version

credits
No more dangling swords by Abakus(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4860)
Realistic Ragdolls and Force by dDefinder(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=601) 


thank you, have a fun!
author: Ryeong
